lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump and Fox News faced off again, this time over the anchor Megyn Kelly’s inclusion as moderator for Thursday’s debate.

byline.contributor: Thomas Kaplan contributed reporting from Des Moines.
byline.original: By MAGGIE HABERMAN and NICK CORASANITI

snippet: Mr. Trump and Fox News faced off again, this time over the anchor Megyn Kelly’s inclusion as moderator for Thursday’s debate.

headline.main: Donald Trump, in Feud With Fox News, Shuns Debate
headline.print_headline: Trump, in Feud With Network, Shuns Debate

abstract: Donald J Trump threatens not to participate in Republican presidential debate on Fox News unless network replaces news anchor Megyn Kelly as moderator; Trump has clashed with Kelly since first presidential debate in August 2015, when she questioned him about denigrating comments he made about women; incident, which raises threat of diminished viewership for Fox, represents latest confrontation in ongoing feud between media and political powerhouses.
